description:
Laki`s pursuit of precious Vearth causes one of her Shandorian comrades to be injured during the battle with Ohm. As night falls on Upper Yard, the Straw Hats dream of gold while dancing with wolves!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Festival on the Night Before Gold-Hunting! Feelings for Vearth!
La veillée de la ruée vers l`or ! Nos pensées vont à la Vearth !
งานเลี้ยงค่ำคืนก่อนขุมทอง! ความคิดคำนึงถึงวาซ!
黄金前夜祭! 「ヴァース」への想い!
